summary: Adds a powerful Dwarven Sniper Rifle that can be crafted in any forge. It also adds a new type of ammo that has muzzle flash effect and has a AWP shooting sound effect. The weapon has two modes, Normal and Silenced. Silenced mode deals lesser damage. You can change modes using the forge.
descriptionHtml:
[font=century gothic][size=5]BASIC INFO[/size]
Adds a powerful Dwarven Sniper Rifle that can be crafted in any forge.
It also adds a new type of ammo that has muzzle flash effect and has
a AWP shooting sound effect. The weapon has two modes, Normal and
Silenced. Silenced mode deals lesser damage. You can change modes using
the forge.

[right][size=5]REQUIREMENTS[/size]
Skyrim version 1.9.32
Dawnguard[/right]

[size=5]CRAFTING & SWITCHING MODES[/size]
I made the crafting a bit more unique, it's like you are buying from the forge.

CRAFTING:
Recipe for Crafting:
Weapon:
- 1 Crossbow
- 5000 Gold

Ammo:
Using a steel bolt gives you a 1 piece of ammo while using the dwarven bolt gives
you 3 pcs of ammo.
- 1 Steel Bolt/Dwarven Bolt
- 2 Gold

CHANGING MODES:
if you need to change from normal to silenced, just go to the forge and craft the
silenced using the normal sniper rifle you have.

Normal ---> Silenced
Recipe:
- Dwarven AWP Sniper Rifle
- 50 Gold

Silenced ---> Normal
Recipe
- Dwarven AWP Sniper Rifle (Silenced)
- 50 Gold

[center][size=5]VIDEO PREVIEW[/size]
[youtube]me3AflFTiRQ[/youtube][/center]

[right][size=5]RECOMMENDATIONS[/size]
Weapon Mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60224/]Daedric Chakram[/url]
Weapon Mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27614/]Reaper of Souls Scythe[/url]
Gun Mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26605/?]SkyRevolution - Assault Rifles[/url][/right]

[size=5]INSTALLATION[/size]
NMM or MO:
- download the file
- simply install

MANUAL:
- download main file
- extract files with winRAR
- copy all the files you extracted then paste it in your data folder
- open your SkyrimLauncher and activate the mod
- start Skyrim and have fun
[/font]
author: Loshirai14

files.name: Dwarven AWP Sniper Rifle
files.changelogHtml:
Introduced Dwarven AWP Sniper Rifle
Introduced Dwarven AWP Sniper Rifle (Silenced)
Introduced Rifle Ammo
Changing Modes (Normal to Silenced, Silenced to Normal)
Muzzle Flash Effect
AWP Sound Effect
